attributes.action: Scrap the Sky+ BT pay per view charges for the upcoming football fixtures!
attributes.additional_details: Fans are unable to go to matches due to Covid-19 regulations so this is the only way fans can watch the game. It is nearly the price of a childs ticket to sit in your own home! People already pay significantly high costs for BT and sky subscriptions yet are being charged additionally. Many people won’t be able to afford this aswell due to jobs being lost. We want our football back!
attributes.background: We as football fans are being charged £14.95 per match to watch football games. This is on top of normal sports subscriptions. We need these charges scrapping!

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for broadcasters and the football authorities.
